about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes

  • Improved version of the rank 17 recon interceptor “Sai”
  • Active module “Trampoline”
  • Unique portrait “Saurus”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

The Cartel managed to get their hands on several units of the Superkite fighter. Pirate engineers spent a long time studying the design of the interceptor and later rebuilt it. This model was equipped with a microwarp engine and a powerful artisanal marching engine. Later, Sai was also equipped with a reinforced nose and a titanium blade, which made it famous as a miniature battering ram that could pierce fighter ships through.
detailed_description:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes

  • Improved version of the rank 17 recon interceptor “Sai”
  • Active module “Trampoline”
  • Unique portrait “Saurus”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

The Cartel managed to get their hands on several units of the Superkite fighter. Pirate engineers spent a long time studying the design of the interceptor and later rebuilt it. This model was equipped with a microwarp engine and a powerful artisanal marching engine. Later, Sai was also equipped with a reinforced nose and a titanium blade, which made it famous as a miniature battering ram that could pierce fighter ships through.

name: Star Conflict - Sai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This pack includesImproved version of the rank 17 recon interceptor “Sai”Active module “Trampoline”Unique portrait “Saurus”Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
